name: The Plant Escape
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Latest version V0.7.2

Design document presentation version V0.5.4

Controls:

  • WSAD, arrows: movement
  • Control, LShift: sprint
  • Mouse: aim
  • F: open/close inventory, when near trader open/close trader inventory
  • ESC: exit game
  • Left mouse click: attack, chose item in inventory, build
  • Left mouse hold: drag item inventory
  • Right mouse click: on plant> pick up if knocked out
  • Right mouse click: on farm> skip time
  • Right mouse hold: split and drag item in inventory
